section_title: AD HOC WORKING GROUP ON LONG-TERM COOPERATIVE ACTION
sentences: The twelfth session of the AWG-LCA opened on 4 October 2010, chaired by Margaret Mukahanana-Sangarwe (Zimbabwe), with Dan Reifsnyder (US) as the Vice-Chair and Teodora Obradovic-Grncarovska (Former Yugoslav Republic of Macedonia) as the Rapporteur.
Parties adopted the agenda (FCCC/AWGLCA/2010/12) and organization of work (FCCC/AWGLCA/2010/2 and 13).
Delegates then turned their attention to the main agenda item on preparation of an outcome at COP 16.
